<title level="1" pfs="">[Formian Worker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1670)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

By far the most common formian on Akiton, workers are focused and industrious, naturally skilled at manual labor and coordinating with peers.

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Formian_Worker.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Formian Worker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1670)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Formian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=419" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Akitonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=94), [Formian](/Languages.aspx?ID=95); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 30 feet

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Hive Mind** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) Formians operate from a shared hive intelligence that allows them to communicate nearly instantaneously. While within telepathic range of at least one other formian from the same hive mind, a formian worker gains a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative checks, Perception checks, and saving throws against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects. If one formian is aware of a combatant, all members of the hive mind within range are aware of it.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 20

**Resistances**
[sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147) 2

**Able Assistant** When using the [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) action to assist another formian from the same hive mind within range of its hive link, if the formian worker rolls a success, they get a critical success instead, and if they roll a critical failure, they get a failure instead.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, burrow 5 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +7,
**Damage** 1d4+4 slashing

**Heavy Lifter**   Formian workers excel at heavy labor. A formian worker can carry 5 additional bulk beyond the normal limits for their Strength before becoming encumbered or overburdened.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-293" />
name: Formian Worker
